name: Crushed
description:
Crushed — is an open world multiplayer survival game. Engage in farming, craft items, build a base and explore the world. And remember: the goal is to survive!

Features


  • Co-op
    Play together with your friends.

  • Building
    Create the base you've always dreamed of.

  • Farming
    Find grains and create your own farms.

  • Gathering Resources
    Get simple and unusual resources by recycling them.

  • Bonuses & Penalties
    Receive bonuses and penalties depending on your playing style. Fractures, poisoning, comfort, etc.

  • Crafting Items
    Craft low-level items and high-level items using workbenches.
